lotOfToDos: Completed To-Dos are automatically archived after 3 days. You can access them from Settings > Export.
deleteToDosExplanation: If you click the button below, all of your completed To-Dos and archived To-Dos will be permanently deleted. Export them first if you want to keep a record of them.
beeminderDeleteWarning: Beeminder users: First read Deleting Completed To-Dos Without Confusing Beeminder!
checklistText: For Dailies, partially completed checklists reduce damage. For example, a 4-item checklist with 3 completed reduces damage for that incomplete Daily to 25%. Completed checklist items on a To-Do add a multiplier: 3 checks means +3x (total 4x) the Experience, Gold, and Mana.
difficultyHelpContent: This multiplies its point value. Use sparingly, rely instead on our organic value-adjustment algorithms. But some tasks are grossly more valuable (Write Thesis vs Floss Teeth). Click for more info.
otherExamples: Eg, professional pursuits, hobbies, financial, etc.
streakText: Has performed <%= streaks %> 21-day streaks on Dailies
streakSingularText: Has performed a 21-day streak on a Daily
perfectText: Completed all active Dailies on <%= perfects %> days. With this achievement you get a +level/2 buff to all attributes for the next day.
perfectSingularText: Completed all active Dailies in one day. With this achievement you get a +level/2 buff to all attributes for the next day.
streakerAchievement: You have attained the "Streaker" Achievement! The 21-day mark is a milestone for habit formation. You can continue to stack this Achievement for every additional 21 days, on this Daily or any other!
fortifyPop: Return all tasks to neutral value (yellow color), and restore all lost Health.
fortifyText: Fortify will return all your tasks to a neutral (yellow) state, as if you'd just added them, and top your Health off to full. Consider this an option of last resort! Red tasks provide good incentive to improve. But if all that red fills you with despair, and the beginning of each new day proves lethal, spend the Gems and catch a reprieve!
sureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
dailiesRestingInInn: You're Resting in the Inn! Your Dailies will NOT hurt you tonight, but they WILL still refresh every day. If you're in a quest, you won't deal damage/collect items until you check out of the Inn, but you can still be injured by a Boss if your Party mates skip their own Dailies.
helpTextHab1: Good Habits are things that you do often. They award gold and experience every time you click the +.
helpTextHab2: Bad Habits are things you want to avoid doing. They remove health every time you click the -.
helpTextHab3: For inspiration, check out these sample Habits
helpTextHab4: More questions? Ask in the Newbies Guild!
helpTextDay1: Dailies repeat every day that they are active. Click the pencil icon to change the days a Daily is active.
helpTextDay2: If you don't complete active Dailies, they will hurt your avatar when your day rolls over.
helpTextDay3: Dailies turn redder when you miss them, and bluer when you complete them. The redder the Daily, the more it will reward you... and hurt you.
helpTextDay4: To change when your day rolls over, go to Settings > Site > Custom Day Start.
helpTextDay5: For inspiration, check out these sample Dailies!
helpTextDay6: More questions? Ask in the Newbies Guild!
helpTextToDo1: To-Dos start yellow, and get redder (more valuable) the longer it takes to complete them.
helpTextToDo2: To-Dos never hurt you! They only award gold and experience.
helpTextToDo3: Breaking a To-Do down into a small checklist will make it less scary, and will increase your points!
helpTextToDo4: For inspiration, check out these sample To-Dos!
helpTextToDo5: More questions? Ask in the Newbies Guild!
helpTextEqu1: The Equipment you buy for your avatar is stored in Inventory > Equipment.
helpTextEqu3: There will be special equipment here during World Events.
helpTextEqu4: Don't be afraid to set custom rewards! Check out some samples here
helpTextEqu5: More questions? Ask in the Newbies Guild!
